casebody.data:
No. 09-10328. Gerald Allen Perry, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 561 U.S. 1014, 130 S. Ct. 3476,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1070,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5109. June 21, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 354 Fed. Appx. 201.
